0	FRANKENSTEIN
1	:
2	OR
3	,
4	THE
5	MODERN
6	PROMETHEUS
7	.
8	BY
9	MARY
10	W
11	.
12	SHELLEY
13	.
14	PREFACE
15	.
16	The
17	event
18	on
19	which
20	this
21	fiction
22	is
23	founded
24	,
25	has
26	been
27	supposed
28	,
29	by
30	Dr.
31	Darwin
32	,
33	and
34	some
35	of
36	the
37	physiological
38	writers
39	of
40	Germany
41	,
42	as
43	not
44	of
45	impossible
46	occurrence
47	.
48	I
49	shall
50	not
51	be
52	supposed
53	as
54	according
55	the
56	remotest
57	degree
58	of
59	serious
60	faith
61	to
62	such
63	an
64	imagination
65	;
66	yet
67	,
68	in
69	assuming
70	it
71	as
72	the
73	basis
74	of
75	a
76	work
77	of
78	fancy
79	,
80	I
81	have
82	not
83	considered
84	myself
85	as
86	merely
87	weaving
88	a
89	series
90	of
91	supernatural
92	terrors
93	.
94	The
95	event
96	on
97	which
98	the
99	interest
100	of
101	the
102	story
103	depends
104	is
105	exempt
106	from
107	the
108	disadvantages
109	of
110	a
111	mere
112	tale
113	of
114	spectres
115	or
116	enchantment
117	.
118	It
119	was
120	recommended
121	by
122	the
123	novelty
124	of
125	the
126	situations
127	which
128	it
129	developes
130	;
131	and
132	,
133	however
134	impossible
135	as
136	a
137	physical
138	fact
139	,
140	affords
141	a
142	point
143	of
144	view
145	to
146	the
147	imagination
148	for
149	the
150	delineating
151	of
152	human
153	passions
154	more
155	comprehensive
156	and
157	commanding
158	than
159	any
160	which
161	the
162	ordinary
163	relations
164	of
165	existing
166	events
167	can
168	yield
169	.
170	I
171	have
172	thus
173	endeavoured
174	to
175	preserve
176	the
177	truth
178	of
179	the
180	elementary
181	principles
182	of
183	human
184	nature
185	,
186	while
187	I
188	have
189	not
190	scrupled
191	to
192	innovate
193	upon
194	their
195	combinations
196	.
197	The
198	Iliad
199	,
200	the
201	tragic
202	poetry
203	of
204	Greece
205	,—
206	Shakspeare
207	,
208	in
209	the
210	Tempest
211	,
212	and
213	Midsummer
214	Night
215	's
216	Dream
217	,—
218	and
219	most
220	especially
221	Milton
222	,
223	in
224	Paradise
225	Lost
226	,
227	conform
228	to
229	this
230	rule
231	;
232	and
233	the
234	most
235	humble
236	novelist
237	,
238	who
239	seeks
240	to
241	confer
242	or
243	receive
244	amusement
245	from
246	his
247	labours
248	,
249	may
250	,
251	without
252	presumption
253	,
254	apply
255	to
256	prose
257	fiction
258	a
259	licence
260	,
261	or
262	rather
263	a
264	rule
265	,
266	from
267	the
268	adoption
269	of
270	which
271	so
272	many
273	exquisite
274	combinations
275	of
276	human
277	feeling
278	have
279	resulted
280	in
281	the
282	highest
283	specimens
284	of
285	poetry
286	.
287	The
288	circumstance
289	on
290	which
291	my
292	story
293	rests
294	was
295	suggested
296	in
297	casual
298	conversation
299	.
300	It
301	was
302	commenced
303	partly
304	as
305	a
306	source
307	of
308	amusement
309	,
310	and
311	partly
312	as
313	an
314	expedient
315	for
316	exercising
317	any
318	untried
319	resources
320	of
321	mind
322	.
323	Other
324	motives
325	were
326	mingled
327	with
328	these
329	,
330	as
331	the
332	work
333	proceeded
334	.
335	I
336	am
337	by
338	no
339	means
340	indifferent
341	to
342	the
343	manner
344	in
345	which
346	whatever
347	moral
348	tendencies
349	exist
350	in
351	the
352	sentiments
353	or
354	characters
355	it
356	contains
357	shall
358	affect
359	the
360	reader
361	;
362	yet
363	my
364	chief
365	concern
366	in
367	this
368	respect
369	has
370	been
371	limited
372	to
373	the
374	avoiding
375	the
376	enervating
377	effects
378	of
379	the
380	novels
381	of
382	the
383	present
384	day
385	,
386	and
387	to
388	the
389	exhibition
390	of
391	the
392	amiableness
393	of
394	domestic
395	affection
396	,
397	and
398	the
399	excellence
400	of
401	universal
402	virtue
403	.
404	The
405	opinions
406	which
407	naturally
408	spring
409	from
410	the
411	character
412	and
413	situation
414	of
415	the
416	hero
417	are
418	by
419	no
420	means
421	to
422	be
423	conceived
424	as
425	existing
426	always
427	in
428	my
429	own
430	conviction
431	;
432	nor
433	is
434	any
435	inference
436	justly
437	to
438	be
439	drawn
440	from
441	the
442	following
443	pages
444	as
445	prejudicing
446	any
447	philosophical
448	doctrine
449	of
450	whatever
451	kind
452	.
453	It
454	is
455	a
456	subject
457	also
458	of
459	additional
460	interest
461	to
462	the
463	author
464	,
465	that
466	this
467	story
468	was
469	begun
470	in
471	the
472	majestic
473	region
474	where
475	the
476	scene
477	is
478	principally
479	laid
480	,
481	and
482	in
483	society
484	which
485	cannot
486	cease
487	to
488	be
489	regretted
490	.
491	I
492	passed
493	the
494	summer
495	of
496	1816
497	in
498	the
499	environs
500	of
501	Geneva
502	.
503	The
504	season
505	was
506	cold
507	and
508	rainy
509	,
510	and
511	in
512	the
513	evenings
514	we
515	crowded
516	around
517	a
518	blazing
519	wood
520	fire
521	,
522	and
523	occasionally
524	amused
525	ourselves
526	with
527	some
528	German
529	stories
530	of
531	ghosts
532	,
533	which
534	happened
535	to
536	fall
537	into
538	our
539	hands
540	.
541	These
542	tales
543	excited
544	in
545	us
546	a
547	playful
548	desire
549	of
550	imitation
551	.
552	Two
553	other
554	friends
555	(
556	a
557	tale
558	from
559	the
560	pen
561	of
562	one
563	of
564	whom
565	would
566	be
567	far
568	more
569	acceptable
570	to
571	the
572	public
573	than
574	any
575	thing
576	I
577	can
578	ever
579	hope
580	to
581	produce
582	)
583	and
584	myself
585	agreed
586	to
587	write
588	each
589	a
590	story
591	,
592	founded
593	on
594	some
595	supernatural
596	occurrence
597	.
598	The
599	weather
600	,
601	however
602	,
603	suddenly
604	became
605	serene
606	;
607	and
608	my
609	two
610	friends
611	left
612	me
613	on
614	a
615	journey
616	among
617	the
618	Alps
619	,
620	and
621	lost
622	,
623	in
624	the
625	magnificent
626	scenes
627	which
628	they
629	present
630	,
631	all
632	memory
633	of
634	their
635	ghostly
636	visions
637	.
638	The
639	following
640	tale
641	is
642	the
643	only
644	one
645	which
646	has
647	been
648	completed
649	.
650	Marlow
651	,
652	September
653	,
654	1817
655	.
656	FRANKENSTEIN
657	;
658	OR
659	,
660	THE
661	MODERN
662	PROMETHEUS
663	.
664	LETTER
665	I
666	.
667	To
668	Mrs.
669	Saville
670	,
671	England
672	.
673	St.
674	Petersburgh
675	,
676	Dec.
677	11th
678	,
679	17
680	—
681	.
682	You
683	will
684	rejoice
685	to
686	hear
687	that
688	no
689	disaster
690	has
691	accompanied
692	the
693	commencement
694	of
695	an
696	enterprise
697	which
698	you
699	have
700	regarded
701	with
702	such
703	evil
704	forebodings
705	.
706	I
707	arrived
708	here
709	yesterday
710	;
711	and
712	my
713	first
714	task
715	is
716	to
717	assure
718	my
719	dear
720	sister
721	of
722	my
723	welfare
724	,
725	and
726	increasing
727	confidence
728	in
729	the
730	success
731	of
732	my
733	undertaking
734	.
735	I
736	am
737	already
738	far
739	north
740	of
741	London
742	;
743	and
744	as
745	I
746	walk
747	in
748	the
749	streets
750	of
751	Petersburgh
752	,
753	I
754	feel
755	a
756	cold
757	northern
758	breeze
759	play
760	upon
761	my
762	cheeks
763	,
764	which
765	braces
766	my
767	nerves
768	,
769	and
770	fills
771	me
772	with
773	delight
774	.
775	Do
776	you
777	understand
778	this
779	feeling
780	?
781	This
782	breeze
783	,
784	which
785	has
786	travelled
787	from
788	the
789	regions
790	towards
791	which
792	I
793	am
794	advancing
795	,
796	gives
797	me
798	a
799	foretaste
800	of
801	those
802	icy
803	climes
804	.
805	Inspirited
806	by
807	this
808	wind
809	of
810	promise
811	,
812	my
813	day
814	dreams
815	become
816	more
817	fervent
818	and
819	vivid
820	.
821	I
822	try
823	in
824	vain
825	to
826	be
827	persuaded
828	that
829	the
830	pole
831	is
832	the
833	seat
834	of
835	frost
836	and
837	desolation
838	;
839	it
840	ever
841	presents
842	itself
843	to
844	my
845	imagination
846	as
847	the
848	region
849	of
850	beauty
851	and
852	delight
853	.
854	There
855	,
856	Margaret
857	,
858	the
859	sun
860	is
861	for
862	ever
863	visible
864	;
865	its
866	broad
867	disk
868	just
869	skirting
870	the
871	horizon
872	,
873	and
874	diffusing
875	a
876	perpetual
877	splendour
878	.
879	There
880	—
881	for
882	with
883	your
884	leave
885	,
886	my
887	sister
888	,
889	I
890	will
891	put
892	some
893	trust
894	in
895	preceding
896	navigators
897	—
898	there
899	snow
900	and
901	frost
902	are
903	banished
904	;
905	and
906	,
907	sailing
908	over
909	a
910	calm
911	sea
912	,
913	we
914	may
915	be
916	wafted
917	to
918	a
919	land
920	surpassing
921	in
922	wonders
923	and
924	in
925	beauty
926	every
927	region
928	hitherto
929	discovered
930	on
931	the
932	habitable
933	globe
934	.
935	Its
936	productions
937	and
938	features
939	may
940	be
941	without
942	example
943	,
944	as
945	the
946	phenomena
947	of
948	the
949	heavenly
950	bodies
951	undoubtedly
952	are
953	in
954	those
955	undiscovered
956	solitudes
957	.
958	What
959	may
960	not
961	be
962	expected
963	in
964	a
965	country
966	of
967	eternal
968	light
969	?
970	I
971	may
972	there
973	discover
974	the
975	wondrous
976	power
977	which
978	attracts
979	the
980	needle
981	;
982	and
983	may
984	regulate
985	a
986	thousand
987	celestial
988	observations
989	,
990	that
991	require
992	only
993	this
994	voyage
995	to
996	render
997	their
998	seeming
999	eccentricities
1000	consistent
1001	for
1002	ever
1003	.
1004	I
1005	shall
1006	satiate
1007	my
1008	ardent
1009	curiosity
1010	with
1011	the
1012	sight
1013	of
1014	a
1015	part
1016	of
1017	the
1018	world
1019	never
1020	before
1021	visited
1022	,
1023	and
1024	may
1025	tread
1026	a
1027	land
1028	never
1029	before
1030	imprinted
1031	by
1032	the
1033	foot
1034	of
1035	man
1036	.
1037	These
1038	are
1039	my
1040	enticements
1041	,
1042	and
1043	they
1044	are
1045	sufficient
1046	to
1047	conquer
1048	all
1049	fear
1050	of
1051	danger
1052	or
1053	death
1054	,
1055	and
1056	to
1057	induce
1058	me
1059	to
1060	commence
1061	this
1062	laborious
1063	voyage
1064	with
1065	the
1066	joy
1067	a
1068	child
1069	feels
1070	when
1071	he
1072	embarks
1073	in
1074	a
1075	little
1076	boat
1077	,
1078	with
1079	his
1080	holiday
1081	mates
1082	,
1083	on
1084	an
1085	expedition
1086	of
1087	discovery
1088	up
1089	his
1090	native
1091	river
1092	.
1093	But
1094	,
1095	supposing
1096	all
1097	these
1098	conjectures
1099	to
1100	be
1101	false
1102	,
1103	you
1104	cannot
1105	contest
1106	the
1107	inestimable
1108	benefit
1109	which
1110	I
1111	shall
1112	confer
1113	on
1114	all
1115	mankind
1116	to
1117	the
1118	last
1119	generation
1120	,
1121	by
1122	discovering
1123	a
1124	passage
1125	near
1126	the
1127	pole
1128	to
1129	those
1130	countries
1131	,
1132	to
1133	reach
1134	which
1135	at
1136	present
1137	so
1138	many
1139	months
1140	are
1141	requisite
1142	;
1143	or
1144	by
1145	ascertaining
1146	the
1147	secret
1148	of
1149	the
1150	magnet
1151	,
1152	which
1153	,
1154	if
1155	at
1156	all
1157	possible
1158	,
1159	can
1160	only
1161	be
1162	effected
1163	by
1164	an
1165	undertaking
1166	such
1167	as
1168	mine
1169	.
1170	These
1171	reflections
1172	have
1173	dispelled
1174	the
1175	agitation
1176	with
1177	which
1178	I
1179	began
1180	my
1181	letter
1182	,
1183	and
1184	I
1185	feel
1186	my
1187	heart
1188	glow
1189	with
1190	an
1191	enthusiasm
1192	which
1193	elevates
1194	me
1195	to
1196	heaven
1197	;
1198	for
1199	nothing
1200	contributes
1201	so
1202	much
1203	to
1204	tranquillise
1205	the
1206	mind
1207	as
1208	a
1209	steady
1210	purpose
1211	,—
1212	a
1213	point
1214	on
1215	which
1216	the
1217	soul
1218	may
1219	fix
1220	its
1221	intellectual
1222	eye
1223	.
1224	This
1225	expedition
1226	has
1227	been
1228	the
1229	favourite
1230	dream
1231	of
1232	my
1233	early
1234	years
1235	.
1236	I
1237	have
1238	read
1239	with
1240	ardour
1241	the
1242	accounts
1243	of
1244	the
1245	various
1246	voyages
1247	which
1248	have
1249	been
1250	made
1251	in
1252	the
1253	prospect
1254	of
1255	arriving
1256	at
1257	the
1258	North
1259	Pacific
1260	Ocean
1261	through
1262	the
1263	seas
1264	which
1265	surround
1266	the
1267	pole
1268	.
1269	You
1270	may
1271	remember
1272	,
1273	that
1274	a
1275	history
1276	of
1277	all
1278	the
1279	voyages
1280	made
1281	for
1282	purposes
1283	of
1284	discovery
1285	composed
1286	the
1287	whole
1288	of
1289	our
1290	good
1291	uncle
1292	Thomas
1293	's
1294	library
1295	.
1296	My
1297	education
1298	was
1299	neglected
1300	,
1301	yet
1302	I
1303	was
1304	passionately
1305	fond
1306	of
1307	reading
1308	.
1309	These
1310	volumes
1311	were
1312	my
1313	study
1314	day
1315	and
1316	night
1317	,
1318	and
1319	my
1320	familiarity
1321	with
1322	them
1323	increased
1324	that
1325	regret
1326	which
1327	I
1328	had
1329	felt
1330	,
1331	as
1332	a
1333	child
1334	,
1335	on
1336	learning
1337	that
1338	my
1339	father
1340	's
1341	dying
1342	injunction
1343	had
1344	forbidden
1345	my
1346	uncle
1347	to
1348	allow
1349	me
1350	to
1351	embark
1352	in
1353	a
1354	seafaring
1355	life
1356	.
1357	These
1358	visions
1359	faded
1360	when
1361	I
1362	perused
1363	,
1364	for
1365	the
1366	first
1367	time
1368	,
1369	those
1370	poets
1371	whose
1372	effusions
1373	entranced
1374	my
1375	soul
1376	,
1377	and
1378	lifted
1379	it
1380	to
1381	heaven
1382	.
1383	I
1384	also
1385	became
1386	a
1387	poet
1388	,
1389	and
1390	for
1391	one
1392	year
1393	lived
1394	in
1395	a
1396	Paradise
1397	of
1398	my
1399	own
1400	creation
1401	;
1402	I
1403	imagined
1404	that
1405	I
1406	also
1407	might
1408	obtain
1409	a
1410	niche
1411	in
1412	the
1413	temple
1414	where
1415	the
1416	names
1417	of
1418	Homer
1419	and
1420	Shakspeare
1421	are
1422	consecrated
1423	.
1424	You
1425	are
1426	well
1427	acquainted
1428	with
1429	my
1430	failure
1431	,
1432	and
1433	how
1434	heavily
1435	I
1436	bore
1437	the
1438	disappointment

2025	Walton

2045	slowly

17090	perfection

17092	always
17093	to
17094	preserve
17095	a
17096	calm
17097	and
17098	peaceful

17100	,
17101	and
17102	never
17103	to
17104	allow
17105	passion
17106	or
17107	a
17108	transitory
17109	desire
17110	to
17111	disturb
17112	his
17113	tranquillity
17114	.
17115	I
17116	do
17117	not
17118	think
17119	that
17120	the
17121	pursuit
17122	of
17123	knowledge
17124	is
17125	an

17131	If
17132	the

17172	is

17190	no

17197	interfere

17208	not

17500	CHAPTER

17502	.
